title: Plan Refinery Unit Turnaround
description: A maintenance planner develops a high-level plan for a major turnaround (shutdown for maintenance) of the Fluid Catalytic Cracker (FCC) unit.

tasks.description: Define the scope of the turnaround by compiling a list of all planned maintenance, inspection, and capital project jobs.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive work scope list for the turnaround is created.

tasks.description: Develop a high-level schedule for the turnaround, including shutdown, execution, and startup phases.
tasks.expected_outcome: A master schedule with key milestones is generated.

tasks.description: Estimate the total budget for the turnaround, including labor, materials, and contractor costs.
tasks.expected_outcome: A preliminary budget for the turnaround is calculated and submitted for approval.
